body: Good shit

Surprisingly, this one really fit on my cup of tea. And the message was really loud and clear. Hands down for author making this story. (Honestly, usually this type of manga i avoided as much as i can).
You reap what you sow
That escalated quickly
oh boy this is brutal
I see interesting
She clearly likes it!
Fucking brutal
That lightbulbs strong as fuck, Took 7 hits before it breaks. Shit, where can I get one?
@boxom Probably the author of this comic for bringing this story onto the table.
So which one is the worst here? The girl, for destroying a lot of families -- or the men, who tortured her?
This is fucking beautiful.
Damn, this is beautiful. But with more context, it would've been fantastic. Thanks to the experts in this comment section, understanding the ending has never been easier.

"You've been using this for a while already" means that she wasn't a virgin. Which is why he remarks it "won't be so bad" when he forces something foreign into there.

hellasz1 is also right about the girl's parents.

source: I'm the guy that translated this.

on the 18th page most likely see the girls parents, listening the trial of 1 person who was the part of the attack. then we see the house from the outside, quite messed up by other ppl, who probably didnt take well what kind of person their daughter was. the parents unable to take that kind of shame and pressure hang themselves while their daughter was in the shower.
the girl destroyed multiple families, and with the power of law on her side, no one could do anything to her. those ppl who played a part in this torture, was resolved enough to pay the price for achieving their revenge, so they went into prison without regrets. in the eye of the masses it CAN be seen as a justified action, and so they wont stand by the side of the girl. in a way the only thing that could have give it a silver lining is if the parents dont kill themselves, and stay alive to support their daughter, who experiencing such a trauma, could grow into a decent emphatetic human. but like that, its only despair

Also, I want to point out the ending, as I've noticed some interesting things that are seemingly out of place, or are unexplained: 1. Who are the couple in the third last panel? 2. Who exactly hanged themselves in the last panel? I'd assume the couple are the girl's parents, and are also the ones who hanged themselves, most likely because of the incident with their daughter. The colour of their pants match, and the wife for some reason ominously says: "It's about time, dear.". But then again, the two may not be connected at all, and the two who hanged themselves could just be one of the victims of the girl who took their revenge on her, and then commited suicide from the guilt afterwards. Needless to say, the ending is bizzarely ambiguous, which matches with the twisted content of this work, and it's speculative title.

Firstly, the object(s) the man inserted into her vagina is most likely a lightbulb. It would make most sense since if something like that breaks in there, it's gonna make some serious injuries, as we saw here. 

The confusion arises when the man says: "...you've been using this for a while already." meaning she was using it to masturbate, making us think it's some beads or dildo, but they are made to not break to prevent just what happened here. Still, it is entirely plausible she was using lightbulbs as a cheap replacement for sex toys, since we know she isn't financialy so well off.
Im pretty sure that was a lightbulb
Yessh! She must have did enough damage to make all those men more than just unhappy and miserable. Nice story, but brutal. 7 out of 10.
I’ve read this multiple times and I still don’t know what the guy is thrusting into her that made her bleed so much
